programme.desc: A famous blogger falls for a single father, not realizing that he is the same reader who criticized her advice online.

programme.desc: Contestants on "The One" try to determine if they're fated to be together. Meanwhile, sparks fly between the female contestant and the handsome ranch owner who acts as their guide.

programme.desc: Sparks fly when an expert in avalanche forecasting brings her new technology to Glacier National Park and faces opposition from the director of Mountain Rescue, who relies on intuition and common sense.

programme.desc: When an antique nutcracker set to be auctioned at the Warby family Christmas charity goes missing, a demanding event planner and the heir to the Warby dynasty try to track it down.

programme.title: Tulips in Spring
programme.desc: When a young interior designer learns her father has broken his leg, she rushes home to rural Washington because her help is desperately needed at the family tulip farm.

programme.desc: When Rory arrives at a bed-and-breakfast for her parents' vow renewal, she runs into the ex who broke her heart. Panicked, she pretends the bed-and-breakfast owner is her new boyfriend.

programme.title: Love on the Right Course
programme.desc: A professional golfer suffers a series of setbacks and returns home to Budapest to reevaluate her future. While there, a golf pro helps her rediscover herself and find love.

programme.title: Love on Harbor Island
programme.desc: Sparks fly between an interior designer and a handsome pilot who finds homes for rescue dogs.

programme.title: Moonlight in Vermont
programme.desc: Fiona (Lacey Chabert), a New York City real estate broker, retreats to her family's quaint Vermont inn after being dumped by her boyfriend, Nate (Jesse Moss). When Nate shows up at the inn with a new girlfriend, Fiona devises a plan to win him back.

programme.title: An Unexpected Valentine
programme.desc: A chance encounter on Valentine's Day brings Hannah and Finn together as they race through New York City to return a lost engagement ring and save one couple's special day.

programme.title: Hearts Around the Table: Jenna's First Love
programme.desc: Jenna plans a charity event for Billionaire Tom Redlands. But working with Tom's right hand Andrew is proving difficult, especially since Jenna and Andrew have a romantic history.
